title: so its fair to say leaver buster busted
body: although you play the whole game if a few of ur team mates dont like u you get reported instantly leaver buster, or skip stats leaver buster, what a joke if your logged on and playing the game u should not be punished with 20 minute que timers for your que starts broken game broken community twice in the last 7 days this has happened

replies.body: Did you know reports mean almost nothing to leavebuster if it didn't mark you as AFK/DC? You can't actually get LPQ in a game where leavebuster didn't mark you as AFK/DC.
check my history no leaver its twice in a week totally wrong
This means nothing, No leaver doesn't mean you haven't AFK'd during the game.
Skipping stats shouldn't make you leaver busted.. If it does you should send a screen shot and send a support ticket. There are ways of actually checking if someone went afk during a game
